long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 6.31
Current version/release in Fedora Rawhide: 6.30-1.fc21
URL: http://drupal.org/project/drupal

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy

More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring
Working on this.

drupal7-7.27-1.fc19,drupal6-6.31-1.fc19 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 19.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.27-1.fc19,drupal6-6.31-1.fc19

drupal7-7.27-1.fc20,drupal6-6.31-1.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.27-1.fc20,drupal6-6.31-1.fc20

drupal7-7.27-1.el5,drupal6-6.31-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.27-1.el5,drupal6-6.31-1.el5

drupal7-7.27-1.el6,drupal6-6.31-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.27-1.el6,drupal6-6.31-1.el6

Package drupal7-7.27-1.el5, drupal6-6.31-1.el5:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 5 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing drupal7-7.27-1.el5 drupal6-6.31-1.el5'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2014-1156/drupal7-7.27-1.el5,drupal6-6.31-1.el5
then log in and leave karma (feedback).
drupal7-7.27-1.fc19, drupal6-6.31-1.fc19 has been pushed to the Fedora 19 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-7.27-1.fc20, drupal6-6.31-1.fc20 has been pushed to the Fedora 20 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-7.27-1.el5, drupal6-6.31-1.el5 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 5 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-7.27-1.el6, drupal6-6.31-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
